con:config.script:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = (('a'..'z') + ('A'..'Z') + ('0'..'9')).join() length1 = 5 length2 = 4
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("App Name","App Test - "+RandomStringUtils.random(length1, charset.toCharArray()));

con:restRequest.name: Create App

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def createresponse = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def jsonreader = new JsonSlurper().parseText(createresponse)
def expectedName = context.testCase.getPropertyValue("App Name")
expName = context.testCase.getPropertyValue("App Name")
def actualName = jsonreader.Name
assert expectedName == actualName
log.info "Create-Delete "+expName

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def createresponse = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def jsonreader = new JsonSlurper().parseText(createresponse)
def status = jsonreader.status
def actualStatus = "success"
assert status == actualStatus
